TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed IOHIDValueScaleType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes different types of scaling that can be performed on element values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDValueScaleType Calibrated = unsigned int32(0)

Docs.summary: Type for value that is scaled with respect to the calibration properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDValueScaleType Physical = unsigned int32(1)

Docs.summary: Type for value that is scaled with respect to the physical min and physical max of the element.
